heading: passage: quentin crisp, 90
subheading: the flamboyant gay writer quentin crisp, author of the naked civil servant was found dead sunday in the northern english city of manchester, where he was to have begun a new run of his long-running one-man show. the cause of death was not made public. crisp described himself as the "stately homo of england" and was known for his flashy clothing and sharp wit. among his famous quips: "if at first you don't succeed, failure may be your style."
author: wired staff
text: the flamboyant gay writer quentin crisp, author of  the naked civil servant was found dead sunday in the northern english city of manchester, where he was to have begun a new run of his long-running one-man show. the cause of death was not made public. crisp described himself as the "stately homo of england" and was known for his flashy clothing and sharp wit. among his famous quips: "if at first you don't succeed, failure may be your style."
